snippet: Ten Syrian soldiers were injured after an explosion on Wednesday, just seconds after the head of the United Nations observer team drove by in a convoy.
abstract: Roadside bomb in Dara'a, Syria, hits a Syrian military truck, injuring ten soldiers, just seconds after the head of the United Nations observer team drove by in a convoy; attack demonstrates the fragility of the international plan to end the country's bloodshed.
lead_paragraph: Ten Syrian soldiers were injured after an explosion on Wednesday, just seconds after the head of the United Nations observer team drove by in a convoy.

headline.seo: Roadside Bomb Hits Syrian Military Truck
headline.main: Roadside Bomb Hits Syrian Military Truck; 10 Wounded
headline.print_headline: Roadside Bomb Hits Syrian Military Truck; 10 Wounded
